price: 147. (This is) the truth from your Lord. So be you not one of those who doubt.
arabic: ٱلۡحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّكَ فَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمُمۡتَرِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: al-ḥaqu min rabbika falā takūnanna mina al-mum'tarīna
